translations: 占星家（astrologer 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: The ancient astrologers believed that the universe was governed by seven planets; students of Shakespeare will recall that the life of man was divided into seven ages.
sentences.translation: 古代占星家认为宇宙由七颗行星统治；学过莎士比亚的人会记得，人的一生被分为七个时代。

sentences.sentence: The type of astrology that most western astrologers practice, horoscopic astrology, requires an exact birth time in order to work properly.
sentences.translation: 大部分西方占星师所使用的占星方法，需要对方提供准确的出生时间，才能正常进行运算。

sentences.sentence: I don't believe that astrologers are able to divine.
sentences.translation: 我不相信占星家能作预言。
